m_szDocTitle: Next Big Future: All electric cars could mean 20-50% more US electric power generation
m_szDocSumamry: All electric cars could mean 20-50% more US electric power generation Reddit The US, Europe and Japan have been slow growing economies. With less than 2.5% GDP growth there is almost no new reactors other than replacing broken ones and shifting some power to where people are moving. 1% is from gains in efficiency. This is why China (and other emerging countries like India) where the fast growth is building most of the new power generation of all types. 70 nuclear reactors are being built worldwide. China is making 30 of them and at about $2 billion per GWe and completing them in 5 years time.
